org.jetel.component.normalize

Class RecordNormalizeTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.AbstractTransformTL
      • org.jetel.component.normalize.RecordNormalizeTL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordNormalize, Transform

    public class RecordNormalizeTL
extends AbstractTransformTL
implements RecordNormalize
    Implements normalization based on TransformLang source specified by user. User defines following functions (asterisk denotes the mandatory ones):
    • * function count()
    • * function transform(idx)
    • function init()
    • function finished()
    Since:
    11/21/06
    See Also:
    Normalizer

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public boolean init(java.util.Properties parameters,
           DataRecordMetadata sourceMetadata,
           DataRecordMetadata targetMetadata)
             throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: RecordNormalize
        Initializes normalize class/function. This method is called only once at the beginning of normalization process. Any object allocation/initialization should happen here.
        Specified by:
        init in interface RecordNormalize
        Parameters:
        parameters - Global graph parameters and parameters defined specially for the component which calls this transformation class
        sourceMetadata - Metadata describing source data records
        targetMetadata - Metadata describing target data record
        Returns:
        True if OK, otherwise False
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

        Parameters:
        source - Input record
        Returns:
        Number of output records which will be create from specified input record
